tumor_staging_system.name: tumor_staging_system
tumor_staging_system.description: Indicate the tumor staging system used to stage the cancer at the time of the diagnosis, prior to treatment

stage_group.name: stage_group
stage_group.description: Stage group of the tumor, as assigned by the reporting tumor_staging_system, that indicates the overall prognostic tumor stage (ie. Stage I, Stage II, Stage III etc.)

script:
(function validate(inputs) {
        let result = {valid: true, message: 'Ok'};

        const {$row, $name} = inputs;
        const $field = $row[$name];

        if(!$field){
            return result;
        }

        const isCancer = $row.is_cancer && $row.is_cancer.trim().toLowerCase() == "true";

        if ($field && !$row.tumor_staging_system) {
            result = {
                valid: false,
                message: `Please provide a value for the tumor_staging_system or leave stage_group blank`,
            };
        }

        if (isCancer && !$field) {
            result = {
                valid: false,
                message: `The stage_group mandatory if the is_cancer flag is set to 1/true`,
            };
        }

        if ($field) {
            let codeList = [];
            switch ($row.tumor_staging_system && $row.tumor_staging_system.trim().toLowerCase()) {
                case 'revised international staging system (riss)':
                    codeList = ['stage i', 'stage ii', 'stage iii'];
                    break;
                case 'lugano staging system':
                    codeList = [
                        'stage i',
                        'stage ia',
                        'stage ib',
                        'stage ie',
                        'stage iea',
                        'stage ieb',
                        'stage ii',
                        'stage iia',
                        'stage iib',
                        'stage iie',
                        'stage iiea',
                        'stage iieb',
                        'stage iii',
                        'stage iiia',
                        'stage iiib',
                        'stage iv',
                        'stage iva',
                        'stage ivb',
                    ];
                    break;
                case 'st jude staging system':
                    codeList = ['stage i', 'stage ii', 'stage iii', 'stage iv'];
                    break;
                case 'ann arbor staging system':
                    codeList = [
                        'stage i',
                        'stage ia',
                        'stage ib',
                        'stage ie',
                        'stage is',
                        'stage ii',
                        'stage iia',
                        'stage iib',
                        'stage iie',
                        'stage iis',
                        'stage iii',
                        'stage iiia',
                        'stage iiib',
                        'stage iiie',
                        'stage iiis',
                        'stage iv',
                        'stage iva',
                        'stage ivb',
                        'stage ive',
                        'stage ivs',
                    ];
                    break;
                case 'rai staging system':
                    codeList = ['stage 0', 'stage i', 'stage ii', 'stage iii', 'stage iv'];
                    break;
                case 'durie-salmon staging system':
                    codeList = [
                        'stage 1',
                        'stage 1a',
                        'stage 1b',
                        'stage ii',
                        'stage iia',
                        'stage iib',
                        'stage iii',
                        'stage iiia',
                        'stage iiib',
                    ];
                    break;
                case 'figo staging system':
                    codeList = [
                        'stage ia',
                        'stage ia1',
                        'stage ia2',
                        'stage ib',
                        'stage ib1',
                        'stage ib2',
                        'stage iia',
                        'stage iab',
                        'stage iiia',
                        'stage iiib',
                        'stage iva',
                        'stage ivb',
                    ];
                    break;
                case 'binet staging system':
                    codeList = ['stage a', 'stage b', 'stage c'];
                    break;
                case 'ajcc 8th edition':
                    codeList = [
                        'stage 0',
                        'stage 0a',
                        'stage 0is',
                        'stage i',
                        'stage ia',
                        'stage ia1',
                        'stage ia2',
                        'stage ia3',
                        'stage ib',
                        'stage ib1',
                        'stage ib2',
                        'stage ic',
                        'stage ie',
                        'stage is',
                        'stage ii',
                        'stage iia',
                        'stage iia1',
                        'stage iia2',
                        'stage iib',
                        'stage iic',
                        'stage iie',
                        'stage iii',
                        'stage iiia',
                        'stage iiia1',
                        'stage iiia2',
                        'stage iiib',
                        'stage iiic',
                        'stage iiic1',
                        'stage iiic2',
                        'stage iiid',
                        'stage iv',
                        'stage iva',
                        'stage iva1',
                        'stage iva2',
                        'stage ivb',
                        'stage ivc',
                        'occult carcinoma',
                        'stage 1',
                    ];
                    break;
                case 'ajcc 7th edition':
                    codeList = [
                        'stage 0',
                        'stage 0a',
                        'stage 0is',
                        'stage i',
                        'stage ia',
                        'stage ia1',
                        'stage ia2',
                        'stage ib',
                        'stage ib1',
                        'stage ib2',
                        'stage ic',
                        'stage is',
                        'stage ii',
                        'stage iia',
                        'stage iia1',
                        'stage iia2',
                        'stage iib',
                        'stage iic',
                        'stage iii',
                        'stage iiia',
                        'stage iiib',
                        'stage iiic',
                        'stage iiic1',
                        'stage iiic2',
                        'stage iv',
                        'stage iva',
                        'stage iva1',
                        'stage iva2',
                        'stage ivb',
                        'stage ivc',
                        'occult carcinoma',
                        'stage 1',
                    ];
                    break;
                default:
                    codelist = [];
            }

            if (!codeList.includes($field.trim().toLowerCase()) && codeList.length) {
                const msg = `'${$field}' is not a permissible value. When 'tumor_staging_system' is set to '${
                    $row.tumor_staging_system
                }', 'stage_group' must be one of the following: \n${codeList
                    .map((code) => `- "${code}"`)
                    .join('\n')}`;

                result.valid = false;
                result.message = msg;
            }
        }
        return result;
    })

meta.notes: This field is dependent on the selected tumor_staging_system

smoking_pack_years.name: smoking_pack_years
smoking_pack_years.description: Number of packs of cigarettes per day multiplied by the number of years donor smoked

meta.notes: Not required if smoking history is unknown or if the donor never smoked. Pack-years is calculated by multiplying the number of packs of cigarettes (20 cigarettes per pack) smoked per day by the number of years the person has smoked. For example, 1 pack year is equal to smoking 1 pack per day for 1 year

French Canadian trace their ancestry to French colonists who settled in Canada, English Canadians are of English ethnic origin and heritage, Aboriginal (First Nations, Metis, Inuit), White (European descent), Arab (e.g. Egypt, Iraq, Jordan, Lebanon), Latin American (Hispanic), Black (African/Caribbean), East Asian (e.g. China, Japan, Korea, Taiwan), West Asian (e.g. Turkey, Iran, Afghanistan), Southeast Asian (e.g. Malaysia, Indonesia, Viet Nam), South Asian (e.g. India, Sri Lanka, Pakistan, Bangladesh), Filipino, Unknown, Other

vital_status.description: Donor's last known state of living or deceased
vital_status.name: vital_status

cause_of_death.description: Indicates the cause of a donor's death
cause_of_death.name: cause_of_death

meta.notes: Cause of death is only required to be submitted if the donor's vital_status is 'Deceased'.

age_of_death.description: Numeric value to represent the age of the donor at the time of death, in days
age_of_death.name: age_of_death

meta.notes: Age_of_death is only required to be submitted if the donor's vital_status is Deceased.

physical_measures_available.description: Indicate if physical measures are available for this donor
physical_measures_available.name: physical_measures_available

laboratory_measures_available.description: Indicate if laboratory meausres are available for this donor
laboratory_measures_available.name: laboratory_measures_available

lifestyle_available.description: Indicate if lifestyle and behavior data is available for this donor
lifestyle_available.name: lifestyle_available

medication_available.description: Indicate if information about medication use is available for this donor
medication_available.name: medication_available

environment_exposure_available.description: Indicate if information about environmental exposure is available for this donor
environment_exposure_available.name: environment_exposure_available

family_history_available.description: Indicate if information about the donor's family health history is available
family_history_available.name: family_history_available

genealogy_available.description: Indicate the donor's availability of genealogical data
genealogy_available.name: genealogy_available

is_a_proband.description: Indicate if the donor is a proband or a family member
is_a_proband.name: is_a_proband

is_affected.description: Indicate if the donor is affected by the condition
is_affected.name: is_affected

submitter_family_id.name: submitter_family_id
submitter_family_id.description: Unique identifier of the family, assigned by the data provider

submitter_donor_id_1.description: Unique identifier of the donor 1, assigned by the data provider
submitter_donor_id_1.name: submitter_donor_id_1

meta.notes: To prevent data collisions, submitter_id cannot begin with any of the CQDG ID prefixes.  The restricted prefixes include: `DO`, `SP`, `SA`,`TR`,`FU`, `PD`.

submitter_donor_id_2.description: Unique identifier of the donor 2, assigned by the data provider
submitter_donor_id_2.name: submitter_donor_id_2

meta.notes: To prevent data collisions, submitter_id cannot begin with any of the CQDG ID prefixes.  The restricted prefixes include: `DO`, `SP`, `SA`,`TR`,`FU`, `PD`.
